summary: Fixes a glitch with Khajiit tails where the lighting is showing on the wrong side of the tail due to an inverted channel in the normal maps.
descriptionHtml:
==Contents==
1. Mod Info & Installation
2. Changelog
3. Credits
4. Permissions
5. Other Mods

==1.Mod Info & Installation==
This mod fixes a lighting error on the Khajiit tails.

To install, just extract the contents of the mod's ../data/ directory to your ../steamapps/common/skyrim/data/ directory


==2.Changelog==
1.0.0.0 - Initial release.

==3.Credits==
Bethesda - Original textures

==4.Permissions==
These files are derivative works based on the original Bethesda files. As such, do not port the files to another game.

Feel free to use the files within to fix your own race mods using the khajiit tail textures.

==5.Other Mods==
Check out my races! (Vaalsark [Anubis-like], Kygarra [Hyena-like], ????? [Much demanded species-like])
- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13561
author: Wolf of the Azar

files.name: Fixed Khajiit Tail Normal map textures for Reversed Lighting
